name: 陳志恆
objective: 討論有機化學與環境、浮選及再生技術等方面有關的部份。主要在使用到的有機化學藥劑，如介面活性劑。
schedule:
第一週：課程說明(introduction)
第二週：有機結構
第三週：Determining organic structure
第四週：Determining organic structure
第五週：Structure of molecules
第六週：Structure of molecules
第七週：Organic reactions
第八週：Organic reactions
第九週：期中考
第十週：Nucleophilic addition to the carbonyl group
第十一週：Delocalization and conjugation
第十二週：Acidity and basicity
第十三週：Using organometallic reagents to make C-C bonds
第十四週：Conjugate addition
第十五週：Nucleophilic substitution at carbonyl group
第十六週：Equilibria, rate and mechanisms
第十七週：Other important reactions
第十八週：期末考
scorePolicy: 期中考30%，期末考30%，與上課表現40%。
materials: Organic Chemistry, Clayden, Greeves, Warren and Wothers, Oxford University Press.

name: 章裕民
objective:
選習本課程應具有普化及一般有機化學知識，此課程主要講授環境上（尤其是應用在工程上）有關的有機化學專業知識，其主要內容包括：１.有機物種與特性２.有機物之基本化學反應３.有毒（害）有機物之處理原理４.環境有機物之代謝與循環機制５.環境荷爾蒙之化性６.微量有機物之採樣分析原理
Based on general chemistry, the course provides professional knowledge on the organic chemistry in the environment. It includes the following major items：1.Characteristics and classification of organics.2.Fundamentals of chemical reaction for organics.3.Mechanics of cycling and metabolism of organics in the environment.4.Chemical properties of environmental Hollomans5.Theory of treatment for hazardous organics.6.Principle of sampling and analysis for micro-organics in the environment.
schedule:
1.Characteristics and classification of organics.
2.Fundamentals of chemical reaction for organics.
3.Mechanics of cycling and metabolism of organics in the environment.
4.Chemical properties of environmental Hollomans
5.Theory of treatment for hazardous organics.
6.Principle of sampling and analysis for micro-organics in the environment.
scorePolicy:
Homeworks  30 %
SCI paper Report   10%
Final Quiz        50%
Other            10%
materials:
1.Manahan, S.E., ”Environmental Chemistry”, Lewis Publishers, London, 6th. Ed. 1998
2. Solomons , T. W., “Organic Chemistry,” John Wiley, New York, 2002.
3. Streitwieser, A., “Introduction of Organic Chemistry,” Maxwell Macmillan International , New York, 2001.
4.Clayden, Greeves, Warren and Worthers, Organic Chemistry, Oxford.2010
